Click RESET (bottom-left) to play the sim again

states.name: fox
states.description: I move around randomly. Every time I eat a sheep, I reproduce. Yes this is how fox biology works. And if I don't eat for long enough, at some random point I die.

states.name: rabbit
states.description: I move around randomly. With some random chance, I'll spontaneously reproduce by duplication. Yes this is how rabbit biology works.
